content.en: Microscopy algorithms: Scientists have been exploring the capabilities of various software and algorithms in the field of microscopy. For example, the EMAN software has been found to perform semiautomated single-particle reconstructions from transmission electron micrographs. Other algorithms, such as NIH Image and Image SXM, New clustering and averaging algorithms, and XMIPP image processing package, have also been used to improve image analysis and processing in electron microscopy. These advancements in algorithmic tools are helping researchers in their quest to understand the microscopic world.
content.da: Mikroskopi-algoritmer: Forskere har udforsket kapaciteterne af forskellig software og algoritmer inden for mikroskopi. For eksempel har EMAN-softwaren vist sig at kunne udføre semiautomatiserede enkelt-partikel rekonstruktioner fra transmissionselektronmikrografier. Andre algoritmer, såsom NIH Image og Image SXM, nye klynge- og gennemsnitsalgoritmer samt XMIPP-billedbehandlingspakken, er også blevet brugt til at forbedre billedanalyse og -behandling i elektronmikroskopi. Disse fremskridt inden for algoritmiske værktøjer hjælper forskere i deres stræben efter at forstå den mikroskopiske verden.
